extendedInfo.description: When someone asks: "When is your baby due?", You can now say:"After 480 kisses!", OR"In 178,326 heartbeats!" OR"In precisely 184,072 minutes"It's fun!, Baby Countdown Tracker can countdown to your baby's due date in many different units! Years, Months, Days, Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Heartbeats or Kisses!Sharing countdown via Email or Facebook!There's more: How about a Baby countdown that can automatically turn into an Birthday countdown after the baby is born! Key features:Full landscape supportCountdown for baby due date or birthdaysAbility to automatically switch to birthday countdowns after your baby is born.Smart birthday countdown, will automatically countdown to your baby's next birthday. 1st, 2nd, 3rd etc.Many different units to measure your countdown. Few different phases to choose fromLovely default images to choose fromUse your very own photos as the backgroundPlay your favorite music from your phone while counting down!Premium in app purchase includes: 4x4 widgetMultiple countdowns (up to 10)Custom phrases Ad Banner Removal Happy countdown!keywords:Widget, Anniversary, Baby, Celebration, Timeline, Big Day, Countdown, Countdowns, Special, memorial, timer, clock, duration

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: App works great. Ez to use. Just wish u didn\'t have to pay to use all the options. Not wasting my money on a timer.
reviews.author: Hillary Comstock

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: Cuts off countdown  in half cant read,  upgrade had more, uninstalled
reviews.author: Abigail C

reviews.title: Don\'t get excited
reviews.comment: You gotta be making money off the ads so why don\'t you have the entire app free? Keep the ads and make everything available. Not paying 1.99 for a timer. I feel thats greedy. That\'s the reason you get 3 stars, other then that its a ok app can\'t put a picture up with the timer until you pay 1.99. Kinda stupid so I uninstalled.
reviews.author: chris garrick

reviews.title: Disliked
reviews.comment: Installed it, it didn\'t have the features I wanted. Requires a time, not just date (c\'mon now, babies aren\'t going to come in the due date anyways!). Maybe for someone with a scheduled section, but that\'s it.And just about every feature requires being paid. Add on top after it was scanned, AVG recommended uninstalling it bc it\'s abusive? No thanks.
reviews.author: Bailey Vazquez

reviews.comment: Very cool!
reviews.author: Carol Davis

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I love this app all I really was looking for was a countdown clock and it has the basics. It would be nice if they gave you more of a variety for saying without buying the app. Overall its really good app I like it.

reviews.comment: It good for wat it say nothin more nothing less
